pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.100: _Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ_. The Pali text just says _dukkaṭa_, without specifying that it is an _āpatti_, an offense. Yet just below the text says that the _dukkaṭa_ is annulled if you commit the full offense of _saṅghādisesa_. The implication is that _dukkaṭa_ should be read as _āpatti dukkaṭassa_, “an offense of wrong conduct”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.126: Nuns’ suspension 14, 15, 16, and 17 are identical to the monks’ suspension 10 at [](pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:0.4), 11 at [](pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:0.4), 12 at [](pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:0.4), and 13 at [](pli-tv-bu-vb-ss13:0.4) respectively, with appropriate gender changes.
